alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 3:14AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Gusty showers will impact portions of Flagler, St. Johns, northeastern Putnam, east central Clay and southeastern Duval Counties through 400 AM EST... At 314 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from near San Pablo to near Satsuma. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Saint Augustine, Palatka, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Hastings, East Palatka and Unf. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Putnam
